ComicInfo.Summary:
The bold new era of Dungeons & Dragons continues! In the capital city, Aidus and Zed-Kraken continue to struggle against their mysterious and powerful attacker. Meanwhile, the rest of the fellowship bands together for a dangerous journey into the Barrier Peaks, hoping to bring an end to Mistress Flame's reign of destruction. Will anyone survive to reach the end of the story? And just who is the griffon-riding "Stealth"... a strange new ally, or a deadly new enemy? Find out, if you dare....
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/dungeons-dragons-tempests-gate-3-tempered-in-fello/4000-144450/
ComicInfo.Title: Book Three: Tempered in Fellowship
